issue.title: Support case sensitive for function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11822](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11822). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
SELECT database() and SELECT DATABASE () are the same and can be queried normally
